{{also|后将军}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=后将军|type=12}}

===Etymology===
General of the Rear (along with General of the Right, Front and Left) was usually picked based on abilities rather than family ties, and was directly subordinate to the central government.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=hòu jiāngjūn
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} ''General of the Rear'' (a high [[military]] [[rank]] held by [[general]]s in ancient [[China]])
